title: New: BLACK HONEY – Teenager
body:
Ah, what a perfect summer song.

From the opening riff, to the dreamy, idyllic chorus, Brighton’s **BLACK HONEY** sound almost impossibly ‘current’. Part Wolf Alice, part Wild Nothing, new track _Teenager_ is the follow up to June’s _Sleep Forever_, which saw them cropping up across numerous top blogs, with this latest release sure to see similar levels of success. With little info available online, the group are inviting people to contact them directly by texting / calling 07578533359\. Check out Teenager below.
